body: @yegor256 please, pay attention to this issue
@jdjasperson thanks for reporting this, definitely a bug on our side. Let me try to fix it

> @rultor release, tag is `0.31`

@yegor256 OK, I will release it now. Please check the progress [here](http://www.rultor.com/t/11497-297049111)

> @rultor release, tag is `0.31`
